verses.verse: וַֽיִּקְרְב֞וּ <S%H7126><s%> came near רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> And the chief הָֽאָב֗וֹת <S%H1><s%> fathers לְמִשְׁפַּ֤חַת <S%H4940><s%> of the families בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children גִלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מָכִ֣יר <S%H4353><s%> of Machir בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh מִֽמִּשְׁפְּחֹ֖ת <S%H4940><s%> of the families בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph וַֽיְדַבְּר֞וּ <S%H1696><s%> and spake לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> before מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> Moses וְלִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> and before הַנְּשִׂאִ֔ים <S%H5387><s%> the princes רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> the chief אָב֖וֹת <S%H1><s%> fathers לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> And they said אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲדֹנִי֙ <S%H113><s%> my lord צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD לָתֵ֨ת <S%H5414><s%> to give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land בְּנַחֲלָ֛ה <S%H5159><s%> for an inheritance בְּגוֹרָ֖ל <S%H1486><s%> by lot לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַֽאדֹנִי֙ <S%H113><s%> and my lord צֻוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> was commanded בַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> by the LORD לָתֵ֗ת <S%H5414><s%> to give אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחֲלַ֛ת <S%H5159><s%> the inheritance צְלָפְחָ֥ד <S%H6765><s%> of Zelophehad אָחִ֖ינוּ <S%H251><s%> our brother לִבְנֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1323><s%> unto his daughters

וְ֠הָיוּ <S%H1961><s%> belong לְאֶחָ֞ד <S%H259><s%> to any מִבְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> of the sons שִׁבְטֵ֥י <S%H7626><s%> of the [other] tribes בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְנָשִׁים֒ <S%H802><s%> And if they be married וְנִגְרְעָ֤ה <S%H1639><s%> be taken נַחֲלָתָן֙ <S%H5159><s%> then shall their inheritance מִנַּחֲלַ֣ת <S%H5159><s%> from the inheritance אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> of our fathers וְנוֹסַ֕ף <S%H3254><s%> and shall be put עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> unto נַחֲלַ֣ת <S%H5159><s%> to the inheritance הַמַּטֶּ֔ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> to which תִּהְיֶ֖ינָה <S%H1961><s%> belong לָהֶ֑ם וּמִגֹּרַ֥ל <S%H1486><s%> from the lot נַחֲלָתֵ֖נוּ <S%H5159><s%> of our inheritance יִגָּרֵֽעַ׃ <S%H1639><s%> whereunto they are received so shall it be taken

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> When יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> comes הַיֹּבֵל֮ <S%H3104><s%> And when the jubile לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְנֽוֹסְפָה֙ <S%H3254><s%> be put נַחֲלָתָ֔ן <S%H5159><s%> shall be then shall their inheritance עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> unto נַחֲלַ֣ת <S%H5159><s%> unto the inheritance הַמַּטֶּ֔ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> to which תִּהְיֶ֖ינָה <S%H1961><s%> belong לָהֶ֑ם וּמִֽנַּחֲלַת֙ <S%H5159><s%> whereunto they are received so shall their inheritance מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe אֲבֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H1><s%> of our fathers יִגָּרַ֖ע <S%H1639><s%> be taken away נַחֲלָתָֽן׃ <S%H5159><s%> from the inheritance

וַיְצַ֤ו <S%H6680><s%> commanded מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> according to the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> after that מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> The tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph דֹּבְרִֽים׃ <S%H1696><s%> hath said

זֶ֣ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַדָּבָ֞ר <S%H1697><s%> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> doth command יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לִבְנ֤וֹת <S%H1323><s%> concerning the daughters צְלָפְחָד֙ <S%H6765><s%> of Zelophehad לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying לַטּ֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> best בְּעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5869><s%> to whom they think תִּהְיֶ֣ינָה <S%H1961><s%> become לְנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> Let them marry אַ֗ךְ <S%H389><s%> only לְמִשְׁפַּ֛חַת <S%H4940><s%> only to the family מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe אֲבִיהֶ֖ם <S%H1><s%> of their father תִּהְיֶ֥ינָה <S%H1961><s%> shall they לְנָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H802><s%> shall they marry

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תִסֹּ֤ב <S%H5437><s%> remove נַחֲלָה֙ <S%H5159><s%> So shall not the inheritance לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִמַּטֶּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> from tribe אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מַטֶּ֑ה <S%H4294><s%> to tribe כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> for every one בְּנַחֲלַת֙ <S%H5159><s%> himself to the inheritance מַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe אֲבֹתָ֔יו <S%H1><s%> of his fathers יִדְבְּק֖וּ <S%H1692><s%> shall keep בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every בַּ֞ת <S%H1323><s%> And every daughter יֹרֶ֣שֶׁת <S%H3423><s%> that possesseth נַחֲלָ֗ה <S%H5159><s%> an inheritance מִמַּטּוֹת֮ <S%H4294><s%> in any tribe בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְאֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> unto one מִמִּשְׁפַּ֛חַת <S%H4940><s%> of the family מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> of the tribe אָבִ֖יהָ <S%H1><s%> of her father תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> shall be wife לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> so יִֽירְשׁוּ֙ <S%H3423><s%> may enjoy בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> that the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man נַחֲלַ֥ת <S%H5159><s%> the inheritance אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> of his fathers

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תִסֹּ֧ב <S%H5437><s%> remove נַחֲלָ֛ה <S%H5159><s%> Neither shall the inheritance מִמַּטֶּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> from [one] tribe לְמַטֶּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> tribe אַחֵ֑ר <S%H312><s%> to another כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> but every one בְּנַ֣חֲלָת֔וֹ <S%H5159><s%> himself to his own inheritance יִדְבְּק֕וּ <S%H1692><s%> shall keep מַטּ֖וֹת <S%H4294><s%> of the tribes בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> so עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> so did בְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> the daughters צְלָפְחָֽד׃ <S%H6765><s%> of Zelophehad

וַתִּהְיֶ֜ינָה <S%H1961><s%> become מַחְלָ֣ה <S%H4244><s%> For Mahlah תִרְצָ֗ה <S%H8656><s%> Tirzah וְחָגְלָ֧ה <S%H2295><s%> and Hoglah וּמִלְכָּ֛ה <S%H4435><s%> and Milcah וְנֹעָ֖ה <S%H5270><s%> and Noah בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> the daughters צְלָפְחָ֑ד <S%H6765><s%> of Zelophehad לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> brothers' sons דֹדֵיהֶ֖ן <S%H1730><s%> unto their father's לְנָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H802><s%> were married

מִֽמִּשְׁפְּחֹ֛ת <S%H4940><s%> into the families בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the sons מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph הָי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> remained לְנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> [And] they were married וַתְּהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> remained נַחֲלָתָ֔ן <S%H5159><s%> and their inheritance עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with מַטֵּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> remained in the tribe מִשְׁפַּ֥חַת <S%H4940><s%> of the family אֲבִיהֶֽן׃ <S%H1><s%> of their father

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הַמִּצְוֹ֞ת <S%H4687><s%> These [are] the commandments וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֗ים <S%H4941><s%> and the judgments אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּעַֽרְבֹ֣ת <S%H6160><s%> in the plains מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <S%H3383><s%> by Jordan יְרֵחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3405><s%> [near] Jericho
